compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy in the European Union and the European Economic Area.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
requirements.evidence: User consent mechanisms are implemented but need improvement.
gaps: Lack of clear consent management interface.
recommendations: Enhance the consent management process to ensure clarity and user control.

requirements.requirement: Ensure data subject rights are respected (access, rectification, erasure).
requirements.evidence: Processes are in place for users to request data access and deletion.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some services incorporate data protection measures.
gaps: Not all services have undergone a Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA).
recommendations: Conduct DPIAs for all services to ensure compliance.

critical_gaps: Inadequate consent management and DPIA processes.
remediation_plan: Revise consent management processes to enhance user clarity.
Conduct DPIAs for all microservices to identify and mitigate data protection risks.
